translations: 数字上变频器（Digital Up Converter）

sentences.sentence: Le duc tho noted it without any show of interest.
sentences.translation: 黎德寿注意到了这一点，但未露出感兴趣的任何迹象。

sentences.sentence: Le Duc Tho had gloated to me in May of the Congressional pressures on us.
sentences.translation: 五月份黎德寿就曾幸灾乐祸地对我大谈国会压力的问题。

sentences.sentence: Obviously Hanoi would not show its full hand until Le Duc Tho was on the scene.
sentences.translation: 在黎德寿出场之前，河内显然不会把它所有的牌都亮出来。
